name: TOW the Ten Questions Quiz | Friends | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which season two episode of "Friends" was Tom Selleck first introduced as Dr. Richard Burke?
questions.explanation:
TOW Ross and Rachel. . .You Know

	When Monica saw Richard again as an adult female, she and Phoebe were catering a party that he was hosting. This episode began a relationship for Monica and Richard that lasted the last half of season two. "TOW Ross and Rachel. . .You Know" first aired in the US on February 8, 1996.

questions.text: In the fifth season episode, "TOW All the Resolutions", what was Phoebe's resolution?
options: Be happy in the new year
questions.explanation:
Fly a plane.

	For their New Years resolutions, Chandler resolved not to make fun of people. Monica decided she wanted to take more pictures. Rachel resolved to stop gossiping. Joey's resolution was to learn to play guitar which Phoebe was going to teach him. "TOW All the Resolutions" first aired in the US on January 7, 1999.

questions.text: In the pilot episode, "TOW Monica Gets a Roommate", who had the first line in this episode of "Friends"?
questions.explanation:
Monica.

	Monica opened the series by telling the group at Central Perk about the new guy she was dating. The opening scene took place in Central Perk. "TOW Monica's New Roommate" first aired on September 22, 1994.  The first line of "Friends" was "There's nothing to tell! He's just some guy I work with!"

questions.text: In the fourth season episode "TOW Joey's Dirty Day", what movie star is Joey going to film a scene with after he returns from his father's fishing trip?
questions.explanation:
Charlton Heston.

	After returning from a three day fishing trip, Joey overslept while rehearsing his lines and didn't have time to take a shower before he was due at the studio. Joey took a shower in Charlton Heston's dressing room. When Charlton Heston wanted to know what Joey was doing in his shower, Joey told him that he stank. Charlton Heston thought Joey meant figuratively and sat him down to talk to him. Before he told Joey to leave, Charlton Heston warned Joey never to use his shower. "TOW Joey's Dirty Day" first aired in the US on February 5, 1998.

questions.text: In the eighth season episode, "TOW the Birthing Video", what holiday were the friends celebrating when the episode opened?
questions.explanation:
Valentine's Day.

	For Valentine's Day, Phoebe borrowed a dog to cheer Joey up, but Joey caused the dog to become depressed. Mona broke up with Ross after learning that pregnant Rachel was living with Ross. Chandler and Monica couldn't have sex after watching the birthing video Phoebe lent to Rachel. "TOW the Birthing Video" first aired in the US on February 7, 2002.

questions.text: In the sixth season episode "TOW Chandler Can't Cry", what finally made Chandler break down in tears?
questions.correct: Ross and Rachel making up after fighting
options: The thought of holding his child
questions.explanation:
Ross and Rachel making up after fighting.

	Monica tries her hardest to get Chandler to cry, but she informs Chandler that he is dead inside. When Ross and Rachel start fighting and then make up, Monica sees Chandler crying. By the end of the episode, Monica can't get him to stop crying. "TOW Chandler Can't Cry" first aired in the US on February 10, 2000.

questions.text: In the tenth season episode, "TOW the Stripper Cries", which actor played the stripper for Phoebe's bachelorette party?
questions.explanation:
Danny Devito.

	When Phoebe asked for a stripper to dance at her bachelorette party, Monica and Rachel found Roy in the phone book. Phoebe made him cry by calling him old. Rachel and Phoebe ended up taking him to the hospital after the party. "TOW the Stripper Cries" first aired in the US on February 5, 2004.

questions.text: In the seventh season episode, "TOW Chandler's Dad", which friend wasn't allowed to drive Monica's Porsche?
questions.explanation:
Rachel.

	Rachel was the only one not allowed to drive Monica's Porsche because she was reckless and didn't have a valid driver's license. "TOW Chandler's Dad" first aired in the US on May 10, 2001.

questions.text: In the third season of "Friends", what books do Joey and Rachel exchange to see which one is better in the episode, "TOW Monica and Richard are Just Friends"?
questions.explanation:
"The Shining" and "Little Women".

	While retrieving some ice from Joey's freezer, Rachel found Joey's copy of "The Shining". Joey explained that he put the book in the freezer because it was scary. Rachel loaned him her copy of "Little Women" to read and she was going to read his copy of "The Shining". Upon reading that Beth died, Joey had Rachel put the copy of "Little Women" in the freezer. "TOW Monica and Richard are Just Friends" first aired in the US on January 30, 1997.

questions.text: In the ninth season episode, "TOW the Boob Job", which two friends asked Joey for money?
questions.explanation:
Monica and Chandler.

	Monica asked Joey for $2,000 to take care of the bills for her and Chandler. When Chandler saw that Joey had written a check to Monica for $2,000 Joey had to make up a reason, so he told Chandler Monica wanted a boob job. "TOW the Boob Job" first aired in the US on February 20, 2003.
